imdb.plot outline: The pilot episode of One And Pun: A Nerd's Guide To Pop Culture. In the first episode we dive into TRUE TRILOGIES, what the term really means, what movies fit the bill, what movies almost fit, some exceptions to the rule, and those movies that everyone thinks are trilogies but are not really. And of course, we manage to get in as much puns and word-play as possible as we go.
imdb.title: One & Pun: A Nerd's Guide To Pop Culture
akas: One & Pun: A Nerd's Guide To Pop Culture (United States)
plot: The pilot episode of One And Pun: A Nerd's Guide To Pop Culture. In the first episode we dive into TRUE TRILOGIES, what the term really means, what movies fit the bill, what movies almost fit, some exceptions to the rule, and those movies that everyone thinks are trilogies but are not really. And of course, we manage to get in as much puns and word-play as possible as we go.::Nick Graff
